text: Atahpara yakhana tara tara [1] byapare sampurna nirasa hala, takhana tara nirjane giye paramarsa karate lagala. Tadera madhye bayase bara byaktiti balala, â€˜tomara ki jana na ye, tomadera pita tomadera kacha theke allahara name angikara niyechena ebam age'o tomara i'usuphera byapare an'yaya karechile. Kaje'i ami kichute'i e desa theke yaba na yataksana na amara pita amake anumati dena ba allah amara jan'ya kono phayasala karena ebam tini'i srestha phayasalakari
